MainClaim.text: "Dichotomies are artifacts that we devise with some useful purpose in mind

s approach to distinctions and dichotomi.text: "Putnam's approach to distinctions and dichotomies is aligned with the rejection of modern philosophy's dualism

Dichotomies as logical divisions.text: "Dichotomies are primarily a form of logical division

Dichotomies as metaphysical bogeys.text: "When dichotomies are inflated into metaphysical dichotomies

s view on thick ethical concepts.text: "Putnam holds that thick ethical concepts are counterexamples to the claim that there is an absolute fact/value dichotomy

Lamp as an example of a mixed descriptiv.text: "The concept of a lamp is an example of a mixed descriptive and evaluative concept

s view on the fact/value dichotomy.text: "Austin characterizes the fact/value dichotomy as a fetish

Pragmatist approach to language.text: "The view of language presented by Austin in his philosophy of language fits with a pragmatist approach to language

Elimination of the fact/value dichotomy.text: "The fact/value dichotomy should be eliminated as a metaphysical dichotomy

s influence on the rediscovery of Americ.text: "Putnam's work has been instrumental in the rediscovery of American pragmatism

relations.src: Lamp as an example of a mixed descriptive and evaluative concept
Austins view on the fact/value dichotomy
